title: NIELT Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Consultant Posts
description: The National Institute of Electronics and Information Technology (NIELIT) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Consultant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, MCA, M.Tech, and M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the NIELT Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can app...
